name: cranberrymoon (nomore_ari)
description:
< 10 minute demo

---

Explore a mysterious world of lost souls at the end of time, in cranberrymoon: an rpg about a winged vampire. 

A continuation but not really. It's not even close to finished. This is a small piece of a horror/mystery/action rpg. Someday I want the controls to be less janky, and have a complete plot-line, but I'm tired...

---

controls:

- [<-], [->] left/right arrow keys 

-[w], [a], [s], [d] to attack in 4 directions

- [space] start dialogue near npc

flying:

- [^] up arrow key

- time jumps to stay in the air

- hold [up arrow] to fly higher

---

Made with Unity2D.

Art and sound by me.
